channel.title: Changing Rewards In Pestcontrol? Help!
channel.description: I want to change the rewards players get in pest control. For example, a reward I want to change is a christmas cracker which you need 200 points for. I want to change the reward to dragon claws. How would I do this?

item.title: Changing Rewards In Pestcontrol? Help!
item.dc:creator: @StrifeScape StrifeScape
item.description:
@StrifeScape wrote:

I want to change the rewards players get in pest control. For example, a reward I want to change is a christmas cracker which you need 200 points for. I want to change the reward to dragon claws. How would I do this?

Read full topic
